New Records: Cade Cunningham scored a season-high 40 points
Key Match Events: Detroit had a five-point lead after the first quarter and extended it to 18 with a 13-0 run to start the second
Cunningham had six points and an assist while Thompson made two steals and dunks during that span
Post-Match Reflections: The Pistons may have found their replacement in the lineup for starting guard Jaden Ivey in Ausar Thompson
The Timberwolves have now lost three in a row to drop back to the.500 mark (17-17)
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cade Cunningham set his previous season high of 35 points against Milwaukee on Nov. 13
Edwards' previous career high was 51 points against Washington on April 9 last season
The Pistons won their third straight and sixth in their last seven games
Others: The Pistons host Portland on Monday night
The Timberwolves host the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday night
